tweets.text: @dpcarrington @BBCAmos @davidshukmanbbc @adamvaughan_uk @RHarrabin @MattMcGrathBBC @fionaharvey please can you help us? Hydrogen sulphide landfill fumes in our town =most complained about @EnvAgency nationally+health effects + exceeding WHO noise &safety parameters @StinkStopthe https://t.co/8LrmlteWhU
@andymhamilton @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL Fortunately the stench from the landfill hasn‚Äôt managed to dampen my happiness at being back home!
@HannahHiles @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL Welcome back to Newcastle.üòü.. hopefully getting better soon.

@Hillfortian @HMUG_Hackney @PymmesBrookERS @StonebridgeLock @RiverChess @Feargal_Sharkey @mayorofhackney @deedeelea @AquiferChalk @RiverActionUK @AnglingTrust @WildTroutTrust @WindrushWasp @ChilternSociety @Chilternstreams @CleanIlkley @RiverBeane @BuryLung @FriendsRib @ReviveTheWye @RachSalv @UnderwaterMedia @suesustainable @DougskiK @KarenShackleto5 @stormwater_jo @RussellB1ggs @PJennings88 @EnvAgency @Ofwat @riverstrust @Thames21 Agree. It would be great if we could all pull together and not keep ripping each other to shreds. We all want a better future for rivers

@HannahHiles @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL Hannah - you need to spread the word around your local community to try a nuisance complaint in the small claims court... people power 

https://t.co/K310Ai7Lfo

@gis_michelle @Hillfortian @PymmesBrookERS @StonebridgeLock @RiverChess @Feargal_Sharkey @mayorofhackney @deedeelea @AquiferChalk @RiverActionUK @AnglingTrust @WildTroutTrust @WindrushWasp @ChilternSociety @Chilternstreams @CleanIlkley @RiverBeane @BuryLung @FriendsRib @ReviveTheWye @RachSalv @UnderwaterMedia @suesustainable @DougskiK @KarenShackleto5 @stormwater_jo @RussellB1ggs @PJennings88 @EnvAgency @Ofwat @riverstrust @Thames21 We haven't seen the ripping yet - but have been around campaigning long enough to know every network has politics. Is there an online forum? Haven't found it so far. If not, could, say, @theriverstrust or @AquiferChalk host one? Am I being naive? Sorry if putting foot in it.
Noxious gas stinking out the local hospital, curtesy of @RedIndustries2  is this ok @EnvAgencyMids ? @GBNEWS #stopthestink #stinkstopthe https://t.co/zQd8FAhQfD

tweets.text: @JoKingDevon @wessexwater @EnvAgencySW I had to report this last September. Apparently a faulty valve discharged milk from its holding tank. That farm is 2km away from the point it joined the streams here and it was running white for an hour before clearing. No mention of a fine being issued. https://t.co/VFuakq0c3V

P.s We want the streets heaving, not the people heaving!#stopthestink @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL https://t.co/eoWRHB9ZMq
@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL It stonk this morning level 5 on Cambridge drive, Clayton

urls.title: Event Duration Monitoring - Storm Overflows - 2020 (England and Wales)
urls.description: The data shows how often and for how long monitored storm overflows discharged during 2020 for 10 water companies operating in England and Wales.

tweets.text: @HMUG_Hackney @KarenShackleto5 @Hillfortian @PymmesBrookERS @StonebridgeLock @RiverChess @Feargal_Sharkey @mayorofhackney @deedeelea @AquiferChalk @RiverActionUK @AnglingTrust @WildTroutTrust @WindrushWasp @ChilternSociety @Chilternstreams @CleanIlkley @RiverBeane @BuryLung @FriendsRib @ReviveTheWye @RachSalv @UnderwaterMedia @suesustainable @DougskiK @stormwater_jo @RussellB1ggs @PJennings88 @EnvAgency @Ofwat @riverstrust @Thames21 @theriverstrust Hey all- the data can be downloaded as a spatial dataset or spreadsheet from here https://t.co/bVILLZCbUo

@RomneyWeir I expect @MPSonthewater will be joining the entire @EnvAgencySE patrol fleet to keep the river safe for the funeral of the DoE next weekend. Time to scrub those water lines folks. https://t.co/ilcOc16OwU

The poison is getting worse, no sleep tonight again, feel awful, smells like stink bombs meet a oil slick, very nasty, no way this is within WHO safety threshold, where can we go to escape this in the middle  a freezing night,@AaronBell4NUL #stopthestink

@HMUG_Hackney @PymmesBrookERS @StonebridgeLock @RiverChess @Feargal_Sharkey @mayorofhackney @deedeelea @AquiferChalk @RiverActionUK @AnglingTrust @WildTroutTrust @WindrushWasp @ChilternSociety @Chilternstreams @CleanIlkley @RiverBeane @BuryLung @FriendsRib @ReviveTheWye @RachSalv @UnderwaterMedia @suesustainable @DougskiK @KarenShackleto5 @stormwater_jo @RussellB1ggs @PJennings88 @EnvAgency @Ofwat @riverstrust @Thames21 Exactly! keeping the intense light of scrutiny on them and staying together, sharing information and not working to cross-purposes. A unified front, and relentless, like a free flowing river.

tweets.text:
Help keep our beaches #LitterFree this #BankHoliday weekend.

Litter left on the beach or next to full bins can easily be blown into the sea.

If a bin is full, take your rubbish home to throw away or recycle.

#RespectProtectEnjoy #BinIt4Beaches https://t.co/jDF0ha77ic

tweets.text: @itvnews @Channel4 @BBCWorld @BBCPanorama @JeremyVineOn5 look how many complaints the environment agency are getting in one month from a town that is being quietly poisoned?! Please share our story @StinkStopthe https://t.co/njMHOxb0x7

@Hillfortian @PymmesBrookERS @StonebridgeLock @RiverChess @Feargal_Sharkey @mayorofhackney @deedeelea @AquiferChalk @RiverActionUK @AnglingTrust @WildTroutTrust @WindrushWasp @ChilternSociety @Chilternstreams @CleanIlkley @RiverBeane @BuryLung @FriendsRib @ReviveTheWye @RachSalv @UnderwaterMedia @suesustainable @DougskiK @KarenShackleto5 @stormwater_jo @RussellB1ggs @PJennings88 @EnvAgency @Ofwat @riverstrust @Thames21 Perhaps one task we could share is to take the 2020 storm overflow spreadsheets and annotate each site name with its river. Maybe someone is already doing that? I sat down to do the Lea & then I thought, maybe I'll ask around & save duplicating effort. https://t.co/Y8rVVZJMWZ
@StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @JolyonMaugham sent me this in January... as a community you can do this at very little cost... you need to try everything now... https://t.co/mmzPdGA0Hc

@HMUG_Hackney @KarenShackleto5 @Hillfortian @PymmesBrookERS @StonebridgeLock @RiverChess @Feargal_Sharkey @mayorofhackney @deedeelea @AquiferChalk @RiverActionUK @AnglingTrust @WildTroutTrust @WindrushWasp @ChilternSociety @Chilternstreams @CleanIlkley @RiverBeane @BuryLung @FriendsRib @ReviveTheWye @RachSalv @UnderwaterMedia @suesustainable @DougskiK @stormwater_jo @RussellB1ggs @PJennings88 @EnvAgency @Ofwat @riverstrust @Thames21 @theriverstrust Hey all- the data can be downloaded as a spatial dataset or spreadsheet from here https://t.co/bVILLZCbUo

@KarenShackleto5 @Hillfortian @PymmesBrookERS @StonebridgeLock @RiverChess @Feargal_Sharkey @mayorofhackney @deedeelea @AquiferChalk @RiverActionUK @AnglingTrust @WildTroutTrust @WindrushWasp @ChilternSociety @Chilternstreams @CleanIlkley @RiverBeane @BuryLung @FriendsRib @ReviveTheWye @RachSalv @UnderwaterMedia @suesustainable @DougskiK @stormwater_jo @RussellB1ggs @PJennings88 @EnvAgency @Ofwat @riverstrust @Thames21 @gis_michelle Good point -- the @theriverstrust map. Rather than us transcribing data back from that, maybe the Trust could give us copies of their underlying enhanced data?
